title: Breadcrumb
name: breadcrumb
description: A navigational component that displays the user's current location within a website's hierarchy. It provides links back to each previous page the user navigated through, enhancing usability and site navigation. Perfect for improving user experience in Astro projects by clearly indicating the path taken to reach the current page.

usage.import: import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, BreadcrumbLink, BreadcrumbSeparator, BreadcrumbLocation, BreadcrumbPopover } from "@/src/components/hybrid-astro-ui/breadcrumb"
